com.giift.sdk.ui.fragment

Class PortfolioFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.giift.sdk.ui.fragment.PortfolioFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener, GiiftBroadcastReceiver.Callback, RecyclerTouchListener.ClickListener

    public class PortfolioFragment
extends Fragment
implements RecyclerTouchListener.ClickListener, android.view.View.OnClickListener, GiiftBroadcastReceiver.Callback
    Fragment displaying the portfolio of a specific user. Required arguments are:
    • User.ID
    User Id, can also be changed/set later using method SetUserId(String)
    Author:
    Nicolas Lagier

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PortfolioFragment.Callback
      Callback to be implemented by the parent activity to be informed of actions requested by the user.
      static interface  PortfolioFragment.CallbackSearchView
      Callback to be implemented by the parent activity when SearchView is expanded/collapsed user.
      static interface  PortfolioFragment.SwipeCallback

        public <any> onCreateLoader(int id,
                            android.os.Bundle args)
        Load the list of active cards of the user from the GiiftProvider. Using a CursorLoader allows receiving updated automatically when it is changed on the GiiftProvider
